website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Talk is a no-frills Bluetooth headset that's heavy on value and light on features.
cons: Finicky to find a good fit

customer_reviews.title: Okay headset
customer_reviews.text: Headset works ok. It does not get loud enough in noisy environments for me. The power switch is in a bad place. On several occasions, I have accidentally redialed a phone number by hitting other buttons when trying to turn off the headset. This may be just an issue for me, but I never had that same problem with other headsets. The answer/end call button is to sensitive. It is to easily depressed by unintentional contact. Having said all of that, the headset does work decently for the price. If you need a Bluetooth headset to use in an average environment that is not to noisy, it will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: wj

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and performance in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bluetooth for almost a week. Pairing was effortless, and it is now paired with my laptop and Samsung S5. I have not had a chance to use it with Skype yet to rate microphone performance for the laptop, but sound is clear. This is my first Jabra product and I am very impressed-If the call button was not directly over the earpiece it would be 5 stars but every time I try to seat it more firmly in my ear the button gets pressed and I redial the last call.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: I lost my Jabra
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I could not keep it from falling out of my ear, It worked good, I hate that it got lost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not announce who is calling
customer_reviews.text: Does not announce who is calling, just rings in my ear, which is okay. I didn't expect it to be really nice since it was cheap. For what it costs, its fine. Battery lasts a few days, which is good. But I only use it about twice a day for a few minutes. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: S Morris

customer_reviews.title: correct as seller said
customer_reviews.text: especially, i can connect 2 devices at the same time that i expected, one my laptop msi p65 and one my cell phone LG v60. i'm pleasure. however, noise cancelling = 0 star, but it is not a big deal with me
customer_reviews.author: Son

customer_reviews.title: My go to Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this Bluetooth several times for myself and for gifts. It works great, the sound is clear and I charge mine once a week. It’s a really good deal for the price. I would Definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I like this blue tooth.. my ears are small and this is the perfect size for my ear...it is small, discreet, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the spoken warning that the battery is about to ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with iPhone 6Plus, talking and connection to Pandora. Very clear sound on phone calls, both for me and for the other party. Used many hours before it needs re-charging. I love the spoken warning that the battery is about to run out. Fast re-charging with iPhone charger. Have not determined how far from the phone it should be, before it disconnects. Good for multi-tasking. Using headset while phone is being charged at the same time. Cannot be used and charged at the same time (? per instruction). Needs hook to keep in place on ear. Having trouble without the hook, falls out easily. Afraid might lose it without the hook. Highly recommend this, considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Glad that I didn't listen to all the negative feedback
customer_reviews.text: Glad that I didn't listen to all the negative feedback. This product is awesome. Yes, Ill agree that the on/off switch is very close to the top button...but its manageable, and doesn't hinder this product at all. Great volume and speaker. Id say if anything is annoying its the very loud buzzing that occurs when you walk too far away from your phone. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound clarity
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use and sound clarity are really good. The only problem I have with this headset is that if I wear it for very long, the narrow piece that goes behind my ear starts to get a bit irritated, almost like it fits a bit too tight. However, it took a couple of hours for that to happen, and I have had no problem with using it shorter periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: It was a double Bluetooth battery life did not last very long
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and poor sound
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected very poor sound will go to Bestbuyto purchase new one brqnd new in box
customer_reviews.author: NAA

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice Bluetooth device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy Bluetooth device. I purchased a used item, but was very surprised at how nice it worked and how stylish it looks!
customer_reviews.author: mikedeerfish

customer_reviews.title: Earpiece
customer_reviews.text: Duh I lost the one i bought at the electronics store frys that cost me 10 dollars less than this one. Anyway I needed a new one. The volume is much better on this one that I will say. However the earpieces don't fit my ear and come lose from my ear very irritating and uncomfortable. I don't it all that much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say this Bluetooth headset works very good. The sound quality is clear and the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say this Bluetooth headset works very good. The sound quality is clear and the battery life is very good. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MCJ

customer_reviews.title: Affordable comfortable clear-works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked my last one, the price is great, I can hear clearly and so can the people I'm talking to. I don't like spending lots on a Bluetooth because the battery only lasts so long in each of them before replacing. Why not get a great one at an affordable cost? I'm a satisfied customer. I'm also keenly aware of sound and eq and the sound is really comfortable for me ears!
customer_reviews.author: Time2upgrade

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, but the big button is easy to accidentally press while adjusting the headset. The "beeps" (while adjusting the volume) are very loud. Battery life is good. And I appreciate that it charges via a micro-usb port. Price is good.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing Super easy to connect and use and looks nice wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: June Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Two Uses
customer_reviews.text: Had another Jaba (Classic - $29.99) unit which works great with my Bluetooth TV (use it b/c of hearing problem) but the Talk worked twice and that was it. Returning after a week of trying all while the Classic is working great. The good unit is WAY better than TV Ears which breaks after after a few months *have been through 6 (!) of them over the years
customer_reviews.author: Greene Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Jabra
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this every day. This brand is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a month
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I hate it, but it still rates a 1 star because it stopped working about 1 month after I bought it. It still connects but there is no sound, so it sounds like something has gone wrong inside. I went the Jabra web site but couldn't find a way to contact them. Maybe they'll see this. The last one of these I bought was a radio shack brand x and it lasted for about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn’t perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works decently well for the price. Only issue is people tell me they receive feedback and can hear their own voices sometimes, noise canceling could be improved but it’s a decent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Extremely easy to use and super hardy
customer_reviews.text: I unknowingly dropped my Jabra Bluetooth outside and ordered a second one to replace it - almost 2 weeks later. I ended up finding the first one I dropped outside, in the rain,, and it had gone through a couple grass cuttings as well, and it still works!! This is a great product. Extremely easy to use and super hardy. I will not buy any other Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: AOConnor

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Good sound, steady and comfortable on the ear. It was delivered with no delay.
customer_reviews.author: Fani M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with Nexus 5 at all. Says connected ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work with Nexus 5 at all. Says connected media and phone, but it wasn't working at all. The one successful time I did get it to connect the call was extremely hard to hear. Not much noise (wind) canceling.
customer_reviews.author: DW95

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my Jabra BT2070's battery wouldn't hold its charge for more than 45 minutes. It works really well with my iPhone 4 and more recently my iPhone 5S. It has a good battery life and the sliding switch to turn it on prevents accidental power-up if its in your pocket. I am still getting used to the commands but it is quite different from redialing last number and such.
customer_reviews.author: JanewayCritic

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Sound
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and easy to pair with my phone, but the sound quality was a big disappointment. Every person I spoke with while using it commented/complained about a distracting echo. Stopped using it after about a week. Wish I’d kept the packaging to be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless as a Headset.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to put in your ear without hanging up on the call. Text messages and all other sounds are in the headset. So if you are not near your phone or do have the headset in your ear,you are out of luck. It basically takes over all sounds from your phone. If I wanted to hear music,I would buy headphones not a headset. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LuF

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This product has clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This product has clear sound, it beeps when the phone is not with you, thanks to that, I realized one time I lost my phone and the Bluetooth started beeping and I realized that I dropped my phone and then I rushed back and got it and it saved my life from my phone getting stolen or cracked. I will buy this in the future. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for all day use.
customer_reviews.text: Not meant for all day use. They start to hurt your ear after a couple of hours. If you are the one calling someone who is using this blue tooth you will hear a lot of noise on their side. Would not recommend for truck drivers. But for the price it does its job
customer_reviews.author: Randy Carpio

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don’t like is, you can’t turn it on and off ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is, you can’t turn it on and off while wearing it. That is a Pain in the ___
customer_reviews.author: robert hulcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price
customer_reviews.text: Great product & price, bought 2 for 17 bucks each and well worth it. Easy to use & install plus connects to 2 devices simultaneously. When one's battery dies (not often) I just switch 'em out, no problems at all. Charges easily with included or any other micro-USB charger. Only thing I'd improve upon is range. Earpiece beeps when 30 ft or so away from device.
customer_reviews.author: el mari

customer_reviews.title: Works with one downside
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works but barley touch it and it hangs up the call.
customer_reviews.author: Ed, Oakland California

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I loved the last one I had but lost the ear gel. This may look better but it's not as "user friendly" The on / off switch is on the inside so you have to just about take it off to turn it on and off. It will do but the design is not nearly as good as the older version.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBun

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not that good. But good enough to take call
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not that good. But good enough to take call. I lost my SONY handset, which I bought in 21$. I could not find SONY same handset again anywhere so bought Jabra. Sound quality is not good as compared to SONY. I feel some eco even after ending my call if calls goes beyond 30 mins. I donot know why. For short calls like 5-10 mins this product could be good.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Beohar

customer_reviews.title: No better Bluetooth than this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I lasts all day at work!!! This what it’s hittin for!!! JABRA SON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, don't care for fit
customer_reviews.text: Jabra usually good stuff, and I personally do not care for this only because it is extremely uncomfortable. Have a LOT of adjusting to do in order to use. I tried to go cheap and that is what I got- I recommend spending a few bucks more for a more comfortable headset.
customer_reviews.author: prthree

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Jabra makes great headsets. Not the best, but great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jay

customer_reviews.title: AWESOMENESS ....
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this bluetooth and I 've had Jabra bluetooth before and I only trust this brand, because I've never had issues and I love it! It even plays music through the bluetooth like headphones.
customer_reviews.author: SparkleOnLife

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Quality earpiece for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new bluetooth for work related activities. Love the music and podcast play. Sounds better than my walkman I had in the 80's! Quick charge and nice quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: Wildirishman64

customer_reviews.title: Very easily falls and that big sensitive button make it impossible
customer_reviews.text: Not a secure fit . Very easily falls and that big sensitive button make it impossible . The sound quality is poor
customer_reviews.author: sneakerhead80

customer_reviews.title: No longer adjustable or for small ears.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful earpiece, as long as you don't have small ear openings. No smaller ear gels. Oh well, bye bye old friend.
customer_reviews.author: LynnW

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Working well; over the ear piece is a little tight but once you have it situated it stays in place well.
customer_reviews.author: TerryK

customer_reviews.title: Very good and clear
customer_reviews.text: Very good and clear. BUT..... the answer button is very sensitive and sometimes trying to adjust the earpiece I accidentally hang up on people...over ...and over ....and over. I just have yo get used to its location I guess. Other that, Its good !
customer_reviews.author: partyoffive

customer_reviews.title: I like it when it works right
customer_reviews.text: I like it when it works right. It disconnects and then you cannot get it reconnected. Had to call Jabra. They sent me and email with instructions what to do so I keep that with me all the time. There is a very light squealing in it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: County Girl 10

customer_reviews.title: The good then the bad bad bad n ugly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair. So uncomfortable i cant wear it more than 2 hours. The on/off and control button are in user unfreindly places. Very disappointed in the general design. Going to walmart and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Really a good type Bluetooth ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of ear buds, because I can use only for one ear.
customer_reviews.author: annie m. pujoue

customer_reviews.title: Not a good headset
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the reviews for this product and most seemed to give a high score but I thought the product was awful. It was difficult to position in your ear and the on/off button was very touchy. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Pay better attention when reading the directions
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting use to the accept/end putting. Kept hitting it twice and redialing my last call at first. Using it mainly when driving since a new state law now requires hands free phone while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... buttons are badly placed and small and it is easy to press the wrong one
customer_reviews.text: I share the comment of other users that the buttons are badly placed and small and it is easy to press the wrong one, other than that it seems peopel can hear their own echo when I use it and do not go on mute
customer_reviews.author: manolo

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: loved it....charged it and now i can't get it to turn on? help pls
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price. Came with extra ear chip. Very good range from host device. Gas good battery life and his sensitivity on Mic. Arrived promptly without paying for expedited delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.text: The voice quality is terrible! It's a muffled and difficult to understand. I had one previously that worked fine until it broke but have purchased two since (thought the first replacement might be faulty) and both have been nearly useless to me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cats4lou

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the position of the "on-off" switch
customer_reviews.text: Works well and hooked right up to my iPhone. I don't like the position of the "on-off" switch. It can't be used without taking it out of my ear. I prefer putting the earpiece on and turning it "on" from there. Only reason I rated 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Muver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I order I was so satisfied with the first one I order I just had to order another with this product you can hear game thru it and music to besides the calls you make and receive it's an excellent buy will recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The only downfall is that after wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The only downfall is that after wearing for a while, my ear hurts. I then just switch ears or remove if I don't need to use it. Otherwise, a great product! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of difficulties getting it hooked up to my phone and accidentally hooked up to my boyfriend's phone and we both had one ordered for each of us so when he was trying to call me I was hearing it ring because both Bluetooths were connected so make sure that you go into a separate room if you're doing the same thing for each Bluetooth piece
customer_reviews.author: NikiG

customer_reviews.title: This inexpensive little headset works better than a $130 one that I had
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive little headset works better than a $130 one that I had. This is my second Jabra Talk. The first one lasted several years and only cost about $20
customer_reviews.author: jpd

customer_reviews.title: A lot of static, and the caller said I ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of static, and the caller said I cut in and out. Used it twice and haven't touched it since.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: it worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: It functioned as advertised but, interfered with my hearing aids and glasses. Without my hearing aids, it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Daniel McClean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headset
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read that it doesn't support media control. I does support media volume control, but not play/pause, next/previous track. Good quality headset, but others at this price point offer media playback controls.
customer_reviews.author: 51l3nt3ch035

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and use. If you use the bigger ear loop you will not accidently hit the redial. Great reception and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: positive note this device easily connects to two devices
customer_reviews.text: i have connected this device to three different phones and am constantly told i have 'bad reception' by whoever i'm talking too. i can't use it. positive note this device easily connects to two devices.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use my Bluetooth for driving and washing dishes and other household chores. I don't buy anything but Jabra. Have used them for years. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Prather

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it no matter how inexpensive it is
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well. Drops connection often. And the button is too sensitive - a slight bump can cause it to hang up or redial the last number. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: hate jabra
customer_reviews.text: WORST blue tooth I ever tried very uncomfortable in your ear not adjustable very low volume in speaking and listening
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad connection
customer_reviews.text: This item works great until you walk a few feet away. You can still here the person that you are talking to, but they can no longer here you. You have to disconnect and reconnect in order to continue the conversation. When I say a few feet I mean like 10. It doesn't reach far before the installer can no longer here you.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of tricky to insert into ear without pushing a button, but once I figured it out, I love it. First wireless I've had which transmits music as well as monitors calls. Could be designed a little friendlier though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shoffner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a charge. Goes dead in 2-3 hours whether I use it or not.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gary

customer_reviews.title: ... things work consistently and fit in your ear really easily. I have five different brands of Bluetooth headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: These things work consistently and fit in your ear really easily. I have five different brands of Bluetooth headphones (obcessive, I know) but I bought 7 of these to have in my car, my desk, all of my bags, etc. Definitely, my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Erik Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for the price very comfortable, you will forget you are wearing it. Buy one and drive safer.
customer_reviews.author: jerry tackett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works but could be better. Sometimes is hard to hear. Sometimes its hard for others to hear me.
customer_reviews.author: WJR

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I just wish that the switch off/on was on the outer end so that i could have switched it on and off while wearing it
customer_reviews.author: GauravJ

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, both of them have bad sound quality and sometimes it looses bluetooth signal when I have my cell on my pants. It is also uncomfortable after some minute of using it. The only good thing is that it connects very quick to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay in place, falls off all the time and when placing in ear it actually is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Areliz

customer_reviews.title: headset is pretty comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: head set arrived on time and in its original packaging. headset is pretty comfortable to wear, but i get a funny noise when talking to people. it only makes the sound when i speak.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hunter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received this earpiece and it won't charge. It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great basic headset
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Basic functions, but serves the purpose well. Very sensitive function button, may cause unplanned redial when handled
customer_reviews.author: Kirill Roshchupkin

customer_reviews.title: Jabra Talk Bluetooth Headset with HD Voice was a good choice for me
customer_reviews.text: Jabra Talk Bluetooth Headset with HD Voice was a good choice for me; voice is clear and precise, charges quickly, and the talk touch button is easily located at the top of the bluetooth and connects in a reasonable time.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn'Von

customer_reviews.title: My ears are small and this was not comtroble. ...
customer_reviews.text: My ears are small and this was not comtroble. The voice of the headse to loud when i turn it on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband. Assuming your product will work ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. Assuming your product will work as expected and as you said on the description.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great sound quality and
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend based on the recommendation of a previous Jabra Product... Works great, great sound quality and reliability
customer_reviews.author: Albezel21

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this daily and it's great. Even better than my Jawbone some days.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: Have a hands free device to speak when I cama
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it I spoke with people that heard noice on the background and it’s uncomfortable to turn on and off button and the volume control
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Morales

customer_reviews.title: New product sold by seller stopped working in 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Product was good but in one month only it stopped working. I contacted Jabra and gave me new excellent piece. Thanks it was Jabra and they provided me replacement within 1 week only.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: this was everything i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: this was everything i was looking for. hands free completely just speak and it calls or answer text and navigation
customer_reviews.author: byron pearce

customer_reviews.title: MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY REQUIRES TOO MANY HOOPS AND HURDLES AND AN ATTORNEY TO READ FINE PRINT.
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT CEASED TO FUNCTION 30 DAYS OUTSIDE OF AMAZONS RETURN WINDOW. MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY REQUIRES TOO MANY HOOPS AND HURDLES AND AN ATTORNEY TO READ FINE PRINT. . HAVE BOUGHT JABRA IN THE PAST FROM OTHER DEALERS. WILL TRY ANOTHER BRAND NOW.
customer_reviews.author: travis thacker

customer_reviews.title: they were very nice and sent me another
customer_reviews.text: can't walk away from your phone. this one I sent back. they were very nice and sent me another one
customer_reviews.author: Lena Lamarche

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first but it has started making me ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first but it has started making me and the person I'm on the phone with sound like a robot, it disconnects and also un pairs completely from my phone. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The deluxe and best earphone in Jabra line. Very pleasant handsfree use also for active lifestyle. Comfortable ear fitting. Lost the first one so I definitely had to buy a second/new one. Volume and sound button not functioning well on mine.(live outside US)
customer_reviews.author: Ramarok

customer_reviews.title: Nice Earpiece!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice earpiece! Clear sound. I just have to get used to it. When I've adjusted its position in my ear and I'm on a call, I have accidentally disconnected my party.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife and it works excellent. She uses HTC M8 and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sateesh Chandrasekaran

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth but the earhook is too small
customer_reviews.text: Good Bluetooth but the earhook is too small. It keep falling off my ear. The sound quality is very good. The battery dies very fast. But it does its work, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kodzo avudufu

customer_reviews.title: Ok for some but not for me
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my needs but may have others. It very well could be my phone being to advanced requiring a higher tech quality but I found it to be scratchy in sound and low in volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: The only drawback about this headset is that it does ...
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback about this headset is that it does not let you know how much talk time is left. It just tells you when it is time to recharge. Other than that it is very clear and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Hodge

customer_reviews.title: This bluetooth was defective
customer_reviews.text: i believe this one was defective because it beeped all the time like the phone was out of range but it wasn't. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: LeekieP

customer_reviews.title: It worked about 6 weeks and now it won't pair ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked about 6 weeks and now it won't pair to my phone or come on. Don't know what happened and now it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. My cell phone is my business phone
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. My cell phone is my business phone, and customers can always hear me clearly. Good battery life too!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy ohnmacht

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great bluetooth headset. Daughter loves it. So far so good and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Balot

customer_reviews.title: So far it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far! Hope it holds up in the washing machine because my last 3 didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Vestal

product_meta.title: Jabra Talk Bluetooth Headset with HD Voice Technology (U.S. Retail Packaging)
product_meta.description:
Size:One size fits all| Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingKeep the conversation flowing with Jabra Talk. This easy-to-use, Bluetooth headset lets you stay in touch with clear HD sound quality, ensuring every conversation comes through with clear and without disruptions. That means you can stay focused on the call and keep talking while you multitask. Jabra Talk will even talk to you. With its Voice Announcements feature, you can get spoken battery and connection status updates from your headset. The headset also automatically adjusts its volume to adapt to your environment. With Jabra Talk you can stream your favorite multimedia such as music, GPS directions and podcasts (A2DP) directly to your headset – wirelessly. It also features Multiuse, which lets you connect with two active Bluetooth devices of your choice at the same time. Added convenience is provided through the on/off slider button, which enhances your control and use of the headset. Jabra Talk is the perfect headset if you’re new to using Bluetooth, but its features will satisfy even seasoned users. Start talking your way to hassle-free, hands free conversations with Jabra Talk.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


TAKE AND MAKE CALLS - JUST LIKE THAT
Keep the conversation flowing with Jabra Talk. This easy-to-use, Bluetooth headset lets you stay in touch with clear HD sound* quality, ensuring every conversation comes through with clarity and without disruptions. That means you can stay focused on the call and keep talking while you multitask. 

Jabra Talk will even talk to you. With its Voice Announce-ments feature, you can get spoken battery and connection status updates from your headset. The headset will automatically adjust its volume to adapt to your environment. Jabra Talk also lets you stream your favorite multi-media such as music, GPS directions and podcasts (A2DP) directly to your headset – wirelessly.

Jabra Talk features Multi-use, which lets you connect with two active Bluetooth devices of your choice at the same time. Added convenience is provided through the on/off slider button, which enhances your control and use of the headset. Jabra Talk is the perfect headset if you’re new to using Bluetooth, but its features will satisfy even seasoned users. Start talking your way to hassle-free, hands free conversations with Jabra Talk.

view larger FEATURES
A. Answer/end button

B. On/off button

C. StatusDisplay with battery indicator and connection indicator

D. Charging socket

E. Volume up/down

F. Jabra Comfort Eargel

G. Jabra Earhook

USING YOUR HEADSET
 * Answer a call: Tap the answer/end button on your headset to answer a call
 * End a call: Tap the answer/end button to end an active call
 * Make a call: The call will automatically transfer to you headset*. If it does not do so, please tap the answer/end button on your headset
 * Reject a call*: Press the answer/end button
 * Activate voice dialing*: Press the answer/end button to activate the voice-dialing function in the mobile phone. 
 * ƒRedial last number*: Double tap the answer/end button when the headset is connected to your phone
 * Adjust sound and volume*: Tap the volume up or down to adjust the volume

 * Clear sound with HD Voice* technology
 * A2DP Technology for music streaming
 * Voice Guidance for ease of use
 * Jabra Status Display shows connection status and battery status
 * Connects to 2 Bluetooth devices simultaneously with Multiuse Technology
 * Ultimate Comfort Eargels for an all-day perfect fit
 * 2 different sizes earhooks
 * Up to 6 hours of talk time and 8 days standby time
 * Lightweight – only 0.02 lb

*Device and network dependent
